name: Cookie Notification
author: johsjensen

sections.description: Displays customizable cookie notifications. Includes a preview function for viewing your changes before your users do.
sections.installation:
1. Upload and Activate the plugin
  2. Go to Settings > Cookie Notification
  3. Configure the options
  4. Check the activate checkbox
  5. Save the changes at the bottom of the page
  6. View the result on the website
sections.changelog:
1.0: Late May

  • First offical release!

1.1: Late May

  • Danish language support

1.2: Late May

  • Language fix

1.4: Late May

  • Logo added
  • Plugin page URL updated
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload and Activate the plugin
  2. Go to Settings > Cookie Notification
  3. Configure the options
  4. Check the activate checkbox
  5. Save the changes at the bottom of the page
  6. View the result on the website
